tool_description: Digitransit Platform is an open source journey planning solution that combines several open source components into a modern, highly available route planning service. https://digitransit.fi/en/developers
name: MyDigitransitFinland

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mydigitransitfinland.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mydigitransitfinland.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
